content: this crochet table runner includes a built-in centerpiece filled with three layered roses it adds a touch of spring and summer to any home and makes a great housewarming or mother s day gift a video tutorial for the rose is included this was originally published in three parts as the tenth pattern in the weekend mystery crochet alongs with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting flat in row crocheting into chain spaces includes video tutorial rose includes written instructions and video tutorial **skill level** easy **finished size** 52 132 cm long x 11 28 cm wide after blocking **materials** big twist value yarn 100% acrylic 6 oz/170 g 380 yd/347 m 1 skein each in varsity green mc magenta ca and medium rose cb *or approximately 380 yd 347 m in mc and 225 yd 206 m each in ca and cb in any medium weight yarn* us size h-8/5mm mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* yarn needle locking stitch markers optional **gauge** 16 double_crochet = 4 10 cm *exact gauge is not critical for this project* rose = 4 10 cm diameter across *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/01/28/weekend-mystery-crochet-alongs/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/04/05/weekend-mystery-cal-10/
